name: Avoid using css() of many elements
description: This rule will check the use of css() in your file.
output:
Associated to each violation, the following information is provided:
- The number of violation occurrences
- Bookmarks for violation occurrences found in the source code
rationale: Changing display attributes thanks to css() method could generate some performance issues. If you're changing the CSS of more than 20 elements using css(), consider adding a style tag to the page instead for a nearly 60% increase in speed.
total: Number of JQuery artifacts (Javascript source code containing JQuery)
alternativeName: Ensure you don't manipulate stylesheet with css() method to avoid performance issue
